Title: Charles-Hubert Paris 3556 Gold-Plated Mechanical Pocket Watch

Roman numerals. 17 jewel mechanical movement. Comes with deluxe gift box. 14k gold-plated. Brass finish. 1.85 in. Dia. An eye-catching skeleton dial and 17-jewel mechanical movement give the Charles-Hubert, Paris Gold-Plated Mechanical Pocket Watch 3556 its versatile personality. One part classic design, and one part modern accessory, this timepiece is truly one-of-a-kind. Compact and lightweight enough to bring with you everywhere, it has a 14K gold-plated brass case with subtle etched design; crisp white dial with black-tone Roman numeral hour markers; and matching curb chain for real retro appeal.
